/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the road, trees stand tall, their leaves a vibrant green. Buildings, mostly white and gray, line the street, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The image is taken from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, with the blue of the sky and the green of the trees contrasting with the white and gray of the buildings. The image does not contain any text or require counting of objects. The relative positions of the objects suggest a well-planned urban landscape, with buildings and trees neatly arranged along the road. The image does not contain any imaginary content; everything described can be confidently determined from the image itself.
